features: SAVE TIME IN THE KITCHEN: The Hamilton Beach Toaster Oven conveniently toasts 4 slices of bread or a 9" pizza, yet it doesn't take up a too much space on the countertop.
3-IN-1 VERSATILITY: The small toaster oven gives you the versatility to cook 3 ways. It toasts, bakes and broils and is perfect for everyday cooking. Make toast, heat leftovers and more.

EASY-TO-USE CONTROLS: This toaster oven has simple controls that are easy to use. Perfect for anyone who wants a toaster oven that gets the job done without being complicated. Includes 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff.

INCLUDES BAKE PAN, OVEN RACK & CRUMB TRAY: The toaster oven broiler has 2 rack positions and comes with a bake pan for toasting and baking and an oven rack for broiling. The slide-out crumb tray catches crumbs for easy cleanup.
SAVES ENERGY & COOKS FASTER: This compact toaster oven uses up to 75% less energy and is 28% faster than a typical kitchen oven when reheating precooked frozen chicken nuggets.
body.description: Our Hamilton Beach small toaster ovens are the ultimate in kitchen convenience. This handy appliance will toast, broil, or bake all of your favorite foods for your busy lifestyle. And a compact toaster over takes up less counter space making it great for a small kitchen or work area. Pull out crumb tray for easy cleanup.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bake brownies, broil chicken breasts or make a flatbread pizza. The Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Countertop Toaster Oven gives you the versatility to cook 3 ways — toast, bake or broil, yet it won't take up a lot of space on your kitchen countertop. It's perfect for everyday jobs like making toast, cooking frozen meals and reheating leftovers but can do much more.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach Countertop Toaster Oven & Pizza Maker, Large 4-Slice Capacity, Stainless Steel Conveniently toast 4 slices of bread or a 9" pizza in the Hamilton Beach Toaster Oven. The toaster oven has simple manual controls that are straightforward and easy to use. It's great for seniors or anyone who wants a toaster oven that efficiently does the job without being complicated. The toaster oven has a 30 minute timer with Stay On function, a ready bell that rings when the cooking cycle is complete and auto shutoff. With temperature options ranging from 150-450° F, you'll easily cook a variety of foods in this toaster oven. Conveniently toast 4 slices of bread or a 9" pizza The versatility to cook 3 ways — toast, bake or broil Easy-to-use controls — includes 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff Has two rack positions and includes a baking pan and oven rack The slide-out crumb tray makes cleanup easy

Save Time in the Kitchen The toaster oven conveniently toasts 4 slices of bread or a 9" pizza, yet it doesn't take up too much space on the countertop. 3-in-1 Versatility This toaster oven gives you the versatility to cook 3 ways. It toasts, bakes and broils and is perfect for everyday cooking. Make toast, heat leftovers and more. Easy-to-Use Controls The toaster oven has simple manual controls that are straightforward and easy to use. It's great for seniors or anyone who wants a toaster oven that efficiently gets the job done without being complicated. Includes a 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff.

Includes Bake Pan, Oven Rack & Crumb Tray The toaster oven has 2 rack positions and comes with a bake pan for toasting and baking and an oven rack for broiling. The slide-out crumb tray catches crumbs for easy cleanup. Saves Energy & Cooks Faster This compact toaster oven uses less energy and is faster than a typical kitchen oven when reheating precooked frozen chicken nuggets. Looks Great in the Kitchen The stainless steel exterior complements every style of kitchen décor and looks great on the kitchen countertop.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: I like the stainless steel finish. Although its smaller than what I thought it would be, it works well. It doesn't take much counter space but is large enough heat up a serving of leftovers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile Cooking Companion: Countertop Toaster Oven & Pizza Maker Rating: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews.reviewText: The Hamilton Beach Countertop Toaster Oven & Pizza Maker has become an indispensable appliance in my kitchen. With its large 4-slice capacity and stainless steel design, it combines functionality and style seamlessly.One of the standout features of this toaster oven is its versatility. Whether I'm toasting bread, baking a small batch of cookies, reheating leftovers, or making a homemade pizza, this appliance handles it all with ease. The adjustable temperature and timer settings ensure precise cooking every time, allowing me to achieve perfect results no matter what I'm making.The spacious interior of the toaster oven accommodates a variety of foods, making it ideal for both everyday meals and entertaining. Despite its compact size, it can easily fit a 9-inch pizza or four slices of toast, making it a convenient option for small kitchens or dorm rooms.The stainless steel construction not only adds a touch of elegance to my kitchen but also makes the toaster oven durable and easy to clean. The removable crumb tray and nonstick interior ensure effortless cleanup, saving me time and hassle after each use.Overall, I highly recommend the Hamilton Beach Countertop Toaster Oven & Pizza Maker to anyone in need of a versatile and reliable cooking appliance. With its large capacity, precise controls, and sleek design, it's sure to become a favorite tool in your kitchen arsenal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for a small kitchen
reviews.reviewText: Not the biggest, but I like having counter space! The toasting setting is a little odd to set, but does work well. Handy, and easy to keep clean with the removable crumb tray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You (almost) get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toaster oven in October 2019 to replace a nice Cuisinart toaster oven whose bottom element had warped and eventually, literally, flamed out after three years of everyday use. My criteria for its replacement were pretty basic: cheap, easy to use and clean, fairly small, attractive and stainless steel exterior. This toaster oven seemed to check all those boxes so I purchased it, $48.99 at the time. It gets used daily, sometimes even twice a day.Pros: small footprint; easy to clean; adequately (though not very evenly) toasts bread, English muffins, bagels, hotdog and hamburger buns. Operation is straightforward.Cons: it is very easy to burn your food due to the fussy timer dial - NEVER step away to do something else while you wait for your food to toast. The included pan warps when heated - luckily I saved the one that came with my previous toaster oven. And frozen appetizers and mini-pizzas always seem to need 10 minutes or more than the cooking directions state on their packaging; after several disappointing tries I finally just stuck to toasting bread products.So after adjusting to this toaster oven's shortcomings for nearly two years, today I was horrified to find the bottom front corner inside the door is rusting. My guess is the moisture that naturally evaporates and then runs down the glass during toasting has been condensing at this spot, leading to the rust. As you can see from my photos I have taken excellent care of this unit, so the rust is not from any abuse on my part.So there's my two cents - adequate but not spectacular results. I'm glad I didn't pay what is being asked for it now. And now my search begins for its replacement as rust on an electrical appliance makes me very nervous....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We had a very cheap Hamilton Beach toaster before this that finally broke after 5 or 6 years. So we figured we would just get another cheap HB toaster. Unfortunately, they no longer made the previous model, so we got this one. For starters, it's small. Our previous model was not a lot bigger, but it seemed to be able to fit more food in it.Then there is how it actually performs. Not well. It burns most things and does a terrible job of cooking them evenly. The previous model had the little heat lamps above and below in multiple locations within the oven. This one has two and flimsy little heat shields to help disperse the heat more evenly, which they fail at. Not to mention, if anything were to melt and fall on these heat shields, there doesn't appear to be a way to remove them without pulling the oven apart, so cleaning them is really not easy.Some good things though, it is simple and straight forward to use. The settings are simple.Unfortunately, we weren't using it very frequently in the beginning, so it didn't bother us very much. By the time it started really bugging us, it was too late to return it.

reviews.reviewTitle: El hornito perfecto para los que van comenzando su vida en la cocina
reviews.reviewText: Sencillo, práctico, pequeño; pero potente, eficiente, y rendidor. No le pide nada a la competencia por el precio tan competitivo que tiene. Si quieres por fin salir del microondas y aventurarte en un horno tipo tostador para gratinar, tostar, hornear, o darle un acabado más tradicional y antojable a tu comida caliente, este será tu mejor aliado. Perfecto para cuidar la economía al mismo tiempo que disfrutas de toda la conveniencia de un horno convencional, en el espacio de un microondas.Las instrucciones son lo único que deja algo qué desear: son poco claras, y si en verdad quieres sacarle el 100%, harán falta varias pruebas para por fin entenderle, y ahora sí que te vayan saliendo las cosas exactamente como las quieres.Para inciar tu cocina, o para una pareja empezando a darse más opciones, no tiene falla. Para más de dos personas, habría que hablarlo muy bien, o de plano buscar una opción más grande, por que sí es pequeño (tal cual, apenas para cuatro rebanadas de pan). Puedes practicar tus recetas y dejar ricos muchos platos, pero necesitarás mucho tiempo libre si tu idea es sacar más de un plato a la vez.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen artículo - Medidas exactas del Horno
reviews.reviewText: Excelente horno eléctrico con 2 resistencias de 12 litros (pequeño). Hasta ahora lo hemos usado para calentar bolillo y gratinar chayotes con queso (el bolillo se dora de más en las orillas superiores que son más delgaditas en opción de Pan Claro, o sea, tiene buena potencia).Estuve preguntando sobre medidas, ya que no vienen en el instructivo, pero no eran claras las contestaciones por aquí, así que les pongo en fotos las medidas, ya que es muy diferente las medidas del horno por fuera, a las medidas de los espacios que son realmente útiles.Pros: Excelente para espacios pequeños, bonito, se calienta rápido, se limpia fácil, es práctico, somos 3 en casa y nos es suficiente para lo que lo usamos (para cosas grandes usamos el horno de la estufa).Contras: El espacio de 11 cm entre ambas láminas de la resistencia se me hace muy chiquito, me hubiera gustado que fuera más grande, la charola es más pequeña que la rejilla, así que conservamos la anterior charola que teníamos y la usamos si ocupamos un poquito más de espacio, también notamos que se está manchando del acero inoxidable de la superficie de arriba (el otro horno que teníamos también le pasó) me imagino por el calor que emana, para que no les sorprenda, y por último el cable es corto, así que tienen que tener un enchufe cerca.En general, estamos contentos y hasta ahora funcionando de maravilla. Espero que les sirva las medidas, porque estaba con el nervio de que cupiera en el espacio del anterior horno y sí cupo, pero si hubiera tenido esta información, probablemente lo hubiera comprado un poquito más grande, porque es ligeramente más chico que el que tenía. Buen día! =)
Muy bueno, ocupa poco espacio y es práctico de usar, lo recomiendo para principiantes como yo✨

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena marca, calidad y precio reunidos en un producto y de muy fácil manejo
reviews.reviewText: Me agrado su simplicidad y ahorra mucho espacio. Buena marca a muy bajo costo, 100% recomendable tanto para jovenes o amas de casa
Tamaña adecuado para mis necesidades y espacio, calienta bastante rápido
